text: Stephan Leitzinger is a manufacturer of bassoons and bocals based in Hösbach, Germany. Stephan was an apprentice at Wilhelm Heckel GmbH before working in Paris and then establishing his own business in 1989. Numerous professional bassoonists play Leitzinger® bassoons. ==References== ==External links== *Leitzinger official site (English) Category:Companies based in Bavaria Category:German musical instrument makers Category:Manufacturing companies established in 1989
title: Stephan Leitzinger
